overview: Have you ever wondered what would happen if you filled a house full of hot naked men? How about a house full of hot, horny, and hung COLT Men? RIPPED: No Pain All Gain answers that question... and then some.  Director John Rutherford does what he does best. Bringing in the BIG Boys, he shacks them up in pairs, letting the mutual attraction and the man-on-man action speak for itself. When the muscles make contact and the sweat starts to fly we all win. These are men who have paid their dues and have perfected their bodies. Enjoy the results as these COLT Men do what their bodies were built for... Driving, Hard Pounding Sex!
title: Ripped: No Pain All Gain
